CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__groups` ( `id` SERIAL, `title` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `privileges` JSON ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8mb4 DEFAULT COLLATE = utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use this site monitoring service.

1. Data Controller

The data controller for this installation is the site administrator. Please contact the site administrator for any data protection enquiries.

2. Personal Data We Collect

We collect and process the following personal data:

  • Account information: username, full name, and email address provided during registration.
  • Authentication data: encrypted password, multi-factor authentication method titles (not secrets), and passkey labels.
  • Usage data: session information, login timestamps, and consent records.
  • Site management data: information about websites you register for monitoring, including site URLs, connection credentials, and monitoring results.

Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:

  • Providing and maintaining the site monitoring service.
